articles.title: Hundreds of Iraqis fly home from Belarus, abandoning effort to reach EU - CBC.ca
articles.description: Hundreds of Iraqis flew home from Belarus on Thursday, abandoning their hopes of reaching the European Union following more than a week of tensions at the bloc's eastern border, where thousands of migrants became stuck.
